articles.description: The odds are looking favourable for a sixth all-English European final, after Manchester United and Tottenham both win semi-final first legs on Thursday.
articles.title: Europa League: Manchester United to meet Tottenham in all-English final?

articles.description: Ruben Amorim said "nobody expected" Manchester United's win at Athletic Bilbao, but was it the best of his tenure so far?
articles.title: Athletic Bilbao 0-3 Man Utd: Ruben Amorim's best result as manager?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Nottingham Forest vs Brentford in the Premier League
articles.title: Nottingham Forest vs Brentford LIVE: Premier League score, team news & updates

articles.description: Rajasthan Royals' 14-year-old batter Vaibhav Suryavanshi is dismissed for a two-ball duck as his side lose by 100 runs to Mumbai Indians.
articles.title: IPL 2025 results: Vaibhav Suryavanshi, 14, out for duck after century

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on British-Colombian singer-songwriter Sasha Keable with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v British-Colombian singer Sasha Keable

articles.description: Meet Reggie Walsh, the 16-year-old Chelsea wonderkid who made his debut in the Europa Conference League semi-finals.
articles.title: Reggie Walsh: Chelsea teenager becomes club's third youngest ever player

articles.description: Tottenham take a big step towards the Europa League final with a deserved first-leg win over Norwegian side Bodo/Glimt.
articles.title: Tottenham 3-1 Bodo/Glimt: Johnson, Maddison and Solanke score in Europa League win

articles.description: BBC Sport speaks to two campaigners with different views of the Football Association's decision to ban transgender women from the women's game
articles.title: Two opposing views on football's transgender ban

articles.description: Lando Norris says he has "no reason to be worried" about this title campaign despite Oscar Piastri outperforming him at the start of the season.
articles.title: Miami Grand Prix: Lando Norris 'not worried at all' about title challenge

articles.description: British number one Jack Draper cruises past Italy's Matteo Arnaldi 6-0 6-4 to reach the semi-finals of the Madrid Open and move into the top five in the world.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Britain's Jack Draper cruises past Matteo Arnaldi to reach semi-finals
